snippet: The examination, to determine if Tom Benson is mentally fit, would be part of a fight over the future ownership of the Saints.
abstract: District court judge orders New Orleans Saints owner Tom Benson to undergo examination to determine whether he is mentally fit; order is related to family dispute over who will inherit team after Benson's death.
lead_paragraph: The examination, to determine if Tom Benson is mentally fit, would be part of a fight over the future ownership of the Saints.

headline.main: Judge Orders Saints’ Owner to Take Psychiatric Examination
